description: This file contains the implementation of the abstract class MockZigbeeDevice, which models a mock Zigbee device with functionalities to manage endpoints, device attributes, and cluster associations for testing purposes.

classes.name: MockZigbeeDevice
classes.description: An abstract class representing a mock Zigbee device with capabilities to manage endpoints, device attributes, and clusters for testing Zigbee implementations.

methods.name: isDiscovered
methods.description: Returns whether the device has been discovered.

methods.name: setDiscovered
methods.description: Sets the device's discovered status.

methods.name: isRouter
methods.description: Checks if the device is a router.

methods.name: isMainsPowered
methods.description: Checks if the device is mains powered.

methods.name: getEndpoint
methods.description: Retrieves a specific endpoint by its ID.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI-64 identifier of the device.

methods.name: isDefaulted
methods.description: Checks if the basic cluster of the device is defaulted.

methods.name: setDefaulted
methods.description: Sets the defaulted status of the device's basic cluster.

methods.name: getEndpointIds
methods.description: Returns a sorted array of enabled endpoint IDs.

methods.name: getEndpointsByZigbeeDeviceId
methods.description: Retrieves endpoints associated with a specific Zigbee device ID.

methods.name: joinComplete
methods.description: Callback indicating the join process is complete.

methods.name: getParent
methods.description: Returns the parent EUI-64 of the device.

methods.name: setParent
methods.description: Sets the parent EUI-64 of the device.

methods.name: findServerClusterOfType
methods.description: Finds a server cluster of a specified type within the device's endpoints.

methods.name: findRequiredServerClusterOfType
methods.description: Finds a required server cluster of a specified type, throws if not found.

methods.name: findClientClusterOfType
methods.description: Finds a client cluster of a specified type within the device's endpoints.

methods.name: getManufacturer
methods.description: Retrieves the manufacturer information from the basic cluster.

methods.name: getModel
methods.description: Retrieves the model information from the basic cluster.

methods.name: getZigbeeHardwareVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the Zigbee hardware version from the basic cluster.

methods.name: getZigbeeFirmwareVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the firmware version from the OTA upgrade cluster.

methods.name: getFirmwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the firmware version as a formatted hex string.

methods.name: getHardwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the hardware version as a string.
